wikitext.*:
'''Angela Gardner''' is a British member of [[The Tolkien Society]] and former book shop owner. She was chosen to edit [[Wheelbarrows at Dawn|the private papers and letters]] of [[Hilary Tolkien]], as well as a collection of his tales, [[Black & White Ogre Country]].

==Bibliography==
*[[2009]]: ''[[Black & White Ogre Country]]''
*(Cancelled): ''[[Wheelbarrows at Dawn|Wheelbarrows at Dawn: The Memories of Hilary Tolkien]]''
